medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain and constipation.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 week ago with constipation and right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain. Constipation resolved 2 days ago (no blood in stool), but pain persisted. Patient has chills but no fevers. No dizziness or lightheadedness. Tolerating clear fluids but has had no appetite. Had a bowel movement this morning.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Type 2 diabetes; Urinary frequency; Hepatitis in childhood; Leukocytoclastic vasculitis; Cryoglobulinemia; Diverticulosis; Abdominal pain and constipation; Chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL).
